subject: p16848073
History: Evaluation of the patient with ground-glass opacities after right lower lobe transbronchial biopsy.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed with comparison to CT chest from. Heart size and mediastinum are stable. The right upper lung and left upper lung opacities are better appreciated on the previous examination as well as lower lobe opacities. No evidence of pneumothorax is present.
